languages.text: "Мне кажется, вы оба виноваты. И оба должны понести наказание".

traits.locale_text: "Мне кажется, вы оба виноваты. И оба должны понести наказание".

languages.text: "I think you are both to blame. And both must be punished."
languages.original_text: "Мне кажется, вы оба виноваты. И оба должны понести наказание".

traits.locale_text: "I think you are both to blame. And must both be punished."
"I think you are both to blame. And must both be punished."
"I think you are both to blame. And both must be punished."
"I think you are both to blame. And both must be punished."
"I think you are both to blame. And both must be punished."

languages.text: «Creo que los dos tenéis parte de culpa. Y ambos merecéis ser castigados».
languages.original_text: "I think you are both to blame. And both must be punished."

traits.locale_text: «Creo que los dos tenéis parte de culpa. Y ambos merecéis ser castigados».

languages.text: 「お前たち双方に責任がある。どちらも罰せられるべきだ」
languages.original_text: "I think you are both to blame. And both must be punished."

traits.locale_text: 「お前たち双方に責任がある。どちらも罰せられるべきだ」

languages.text: “我认为你们两个都有错，你们两个必须都受到惩罚。”
languages.original_text: "I think you are both to blame. And both must be punished."

traits.locale_text: “我认为你们两个都有错，你们两个必须都受到惩罚。”

languages.text: « Je pense que vous êtes tous deux à blâmer. Et vous devez tous deux être punis. »
languages.original_text: "I think you are both to blame. And both must be punished."

traits.locale_text: « Je pense que vous êtes tous deux à blâmer. Et vous devez tous deux être punis. »

languages.text: "Ich finde, Ihr beide seid schuldig. Und müsst daher auch beide bestraft werden."
languages.original_text: "I think you are both to blame. And both must be punished."

traits.locale_text: Ich finde, Ihr beide seid schuldig. Und müsst daher auch beide bestraft werden."

languages.text: "Bence ikiniz de suçlusunuz. İkinizin birden cezalandırılması gerek."
languages.original_text: "I think you are both to blame. And both must be punished."

traits.locale_text: "Bence ikiniz de suçlusunuz ve ikinizin birden cezalandırılması gerek."
